meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Reseda, with small fragrant flowers.
meanings.sent1: The mignonette in the garden smelled sweet.
meanings.sent2: I planted a mignonette to add fragrance to my yard.
meanings.sent3: The bees loved the mignonette so much, they threw a party in the flower bed!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room like the scent of mignonette in bloom.
meanings.sent5: The delicate mignonette blossoms danced in the gentle breeze.

meanings.definition: A sauce made of vinegar, pepper, and herbs, typically served with oysters.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a tangy mignonette for the fresh oysters.
meanings.sent2: The oysters tasted even better with a splash of mignonette.
meanings.sent3: The mignonette sauce whispered secrets of flavor to the seafood.
meanings.sent4: The mignonette sauce was a zesty companion to the oysters.
meanings.sent5: The mignonette added a burst of flavor to the dish, like a culinary fireworks show.

meanings.definition: A type of fabric with a raised pattern of small dots.
meanings.sent1: She sewed a lovely dress from mignonette fabric.
meanings.sent2: The mignonette fabric felt soft against her skin.
meanings.sent3: The mignonette fabric looked like a field of tiny flowers.
meanings.sent4: The mignonette fabric added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent5: The mignonette fabric shimmered in the sunlight, like a sea of tiny pearls.
